item.description:
Ok Fellow Photographers~ These Photographers are some of my fav's- The work they make is unique and interesting and I feel for it a long time ago...Then I found out that they moved here from AZ a few years ago and Robert teaches at Holy Cross right here in worcester!! ...Here is your chance to meet them and hear about their work...


Wednesday, October 3, 2007
12:00 PM-1:00 PM
College of the Holy Cross: Iris & B. Gerald Cantor Art Gallery
1 College Street
Worcester, MA 01610-2395
Cost: no cost, open to the public

Description: Robert Parke Harrison, associate professor of studio art, and Shana Parke Harrison, who work collaboratively on photography and sculpture, will give a gallery talk in association with the exhbition Crossroads: Holy Cross' Visual Arts Faculty and Staff, Part I. The ParkeHarrison's work has been exhibited widely and is in the collections of many major museums throughout the United States. Visit the Cantor Art Gallery on the wb at www.holycross.edu/cantorartgallery/.

More Information: E-mail: prosenbl@holycross.edu
Phone: 508-793-3356
Entered by: Cantor Art Gallery (cantorart@holycross.edu)

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Lecture: Robert Parke Harrison & Shana Parke Harrison
